content: Is there more to be done in #16536? (This is the "bubble sort" induction.)
@Eric Wieser Can I ping you again on this?

I have golfed the proof of the latest lemma eq_sort_iff (which characterizes sort f among all permutations) a bit.
Are there things left to be done, or can this be merged now? @Eric Wieser @Junyan Xu
I'm super short on time until at least Thursday I'm afraid
OK, no problem. I just don't want this to be forgotten.
